text: Israel competed at the 2015 Summer Universiade also known as the XXVIII Summer Universiade, in Gwangju, South Korea. ==Men's handball== During the men's handball tournament, Israel competed and finished in 5th place.Handball ===Preliminary round - Group B=== ====Standings==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; font-size:90% " !width=160|Team !width=25| !width=25| !width=25| !width=25| !width=25| !width=25| !width=25| !width=25| |-bgcolor=#ccffcc |align=left| |5||5||0||0||159||120||39||10 |-bgcolor=#cccccc |align=left| |5||3||1||1||146||131||15||7 |- |align=left| |5||2||1||2||134||143||-9||5 |- |align=left| |5||2||0||3||147||147||0||4 |- |align=left| |5||2||0||3||130||140||–10||4 |- |align=left| |5||0||0||5||128||163||–35||0 |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; font-size:90% " |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Team Qualified to the Gold Medal Match |- |width=10px bgcolor=#cccccc| ||Team Qualified to the Bronze Medal Match |} ====Games==== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===5th place match=== \---- \---- ===Roster=== Head Coach: Shahar Haber {| class="wikitable" !# !Player |- |6 || Tal Gera |- |10 || Vladislav Kofman |- |11 || Niv Levi |- |12 || Oren Meirovich |- |14 || Dan Tepper |- |17 || Omri Kushmaro |- |18 || Daniel Andres Friedmann |- |21 || Omer Jacob Davda |- |24 || Amit Yehiel Stelman |- |27 || Aleksandr Sychenko |- |28 || Elad Kappon |- |41 || Matan Golz |- |42 || Tal Hershkowitz |- |55 || Ran Eliran Mazki |- |77 || Amit Yehuda Gal |- |88 || Tomer Uriel Toueg |- |} ==References== Summer Universiade Category:Nations at the 2015 Summer Universiade Category:Israel at the Summer Universiade
title: Israel at the 2015 Summer Universiade
